message: I'm aiming for a more balanced split. This considers the time pressure we're both under.
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers
Time is ticking, Alice.  This is a fair offer considering the dwindling value.
Come on, Bob. I've compromised. Don't let the money lose more value.
Alice, let's end this. A 50/50 split is the only fair way to divide this with the time pressure. Don't let greed make us both losers.
